item.title: 特朗普钟爱人工智能，但他的关税却增加了数据中心的成本
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对人工智能和为其提供动力的数据中心情有独钟，但他的关税措施有可能给花费数千亿美元建造这些数据中心的美国企业带来新的成本。【原文：President Donald Trump is all in on artificial intelligence and the data centers that power it — but his tariffs threaten to pile new costs on the US businesses spending hundreds of billions to build them.】

item.title: 土耳其银行出售约 80 亿美元以保卫里拉
item.description: 据直接知情人士称，伊斯坦布尔市长埃克雷姆-伊马莫格鲁（Ekrem Imamoglu）被拘留后，里拉暴跌达 11%，土耳其贷款机构在周三中午前出售了约 80 亿美元，以支撑里拉。【原文：Turkish lenders sold around $8 billion until midday on Wednesday to support the lira after the currency plunged as much as 11% following the detention of Istanbul Mayor Ekrem Imamoglu, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 英国南方水务公司要求部分债权人注销风险债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英国公用事业公司南方水务有限公司（Southern Water Ltd.）已要求其部分债权人注销部分债务，因为所有者麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management）正在向该公司注入新的资金。【原文：UK utility Southern Water Ltd. has asked some of its creditors to write off part of their debt, according to people familiar with the matter, as owner Macquarie Asset Management injects fresh funds into the company.】

item.title: 新兴市场货币下跌，跌势从土耳其蔓延开来
item.description: 在当局拘留了雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安总统最重要的竞争对手后，土耳其里拉暴跌至历史最低点，部分市场影响迅速波及新兴市场同行。【原文：The Turkish lira plunged to a record low after authorities detained President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s most prominent rival, with some of the market fallout quickly spreading to emerging-market peers.】

item.title: 风险最高的股票正围绕工厂活动掀起轩然大波
item.description: 美国小型公司是股市中风险最高的领域之一，其股票在美国经济中的重要地位令人担忧。【原文：Shares of small US companies, one of the riskiest areas of the stock market, are striking a worrisome note for a vital part of the country’s economy.】

item.title: 美债反弹后投资者期待美联储对经济增长的看法
item.description: 债券投资者将期待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在周三的讲话中恰到好处，以保持 29 万亿美元国债市场的反弹势头。【原文：Bond investors will look for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to hit just the right notes in his Wednesday remarks to keep up the momentum behind a rally in the $29 trillion Treasury market.】

item.title: 支出一揽子计划投票成为后视镜 德国债券上涨
item.description: 德国债券周三领涨该地区，因为具有里程碑意义的一揽子支出计划获得批准，这给投资者带来了一些宽慰。【原文：German bonds led gains in the region on Wednesday as the approval of a landmark spending package provided some relief to investors, who are now turning their attention to how fast the measures will be implemented.】

item.title: 据说印度央行将要求银行削减用于套利的离岸远期合约
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度央行已要求货币交易商减少在在岸市场买入美元，然后在离岸无本金交割远期市场卖出获利的做法。【原文：India’s central bank has asked currency traders to reduce the practice of buying dollars in the onshore market and then selling them in the offshore non-deliverable forwards market for profit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以色列银行副行长在推迟任期后获准连任
item.description: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡政府延长了以色列银行副行长安德鲁-阿比尔（Andrew Abir）的任命，这一决定是在拖延数周之后做出的，引起了人们对执政联盟是否尊重该机构独立性的担忧。【原文：Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s government renewed the appointment of Bank of Israel Deputy Governor Andrew Abir, a decision that came after weeks of delay that raised concerns over the ruling coalition’s respect for the institution’s independence.】

item.title: 顶级航运贸易集团称特朗普港口费计划将损害美国利益
item.description: 一家顶级航运贸易集团表示，特朗普政府计划对使用中国商船征收费用，这很可能会损害美国经济，也可能无法扭转中国造船业的主导地位。【原文：A plan by the Trump administration to introduce fees on the use of Chinese commercial ships is likely to damage the US economy and may fail to reverse China’s shipbuilding dominance, a top shipping trade group said.】

item.title: 特朗普关闭应用程序是送给墨西哥卡特尔的礼物
item.description:
帮助安排庇护会面的应用程序 "CBP One "在移民辩论的双方都受到了批评。但它为非法偷渡提供了一个可信的替代方案。【原文：

CBP One, the app that helped schedule asylum meetings, had critics on both sides of the immigration debate. But it provided a credible alternative to illegal smuggling.

】

item.title: 以长远眼光看待美国的经济动荡
item.description:
《布隆伯格经济学》（Bloomberg Economics）首席经济学家汤姆-奥利克（Tom Orlik）探讨了特朗普政府的战略眼光比表面看起来更强的可能性。【原文：

Bloomberg Economics Chief Economist Tom Orlik explores the possibility that the Trump administration is being more strategic than it seems.

】

item.title: 冰岛降息四分之一个百分点，放缓宽松步伐
item.description: 冰岛央行降低了降息步伐，因为工资继续维持物价压力，而美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战使通胀前景黯淡。【原文：Iceland’s central bank reduced the pace of its interest-rate cuts as wages continue to uphold price pressure and the inflation outlook is dimmed by US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 腾讯游戏连创佳绩，增长速度创年内最快
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司公布了一年多来最快的收入增长速度，此前一连串游戏大作帮助中国最有价值的公司克服了持续的经济衰退。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. posted its fastest pace of revenue growth in more than a year, after a string of gaming hits helped China’s most valuable company overcome a persistent economic downturn.】

item.title: 无人机袭击点燃俄罗斯油库附近受损的 CPC 连接线
item.description: 乌克兰无人机的袭击引发了俄罗斯油库的火灾，该油库与里海管道联合体泵站相连，在上个月的一次袭击中受损。【原文：A Ukrainian drone strike started a fire at a Russian oil depot connected to the Caspian Pipeline Consortium pumping station damaged in an earlier attack last month.】

item.title: Vonovia 称德国支出计划加剧住房不确定性
item.description: 欧洲最大的房东 Vonovia SE 表示，德国具有里程碑意义的一揽子支出计划将对该国遭受重创的房地产市场产生喜忧参半的影响。【原文：Germany’s landmark spending package will have mixed effects on the country’s battered housing market, according to Vonovia SE, Europe’s largest landlord.】

item.title: 南非通胀在预期暂停加息前夕保持稳定
item.description: 在普遍预期的暂停加息前夕，南非的通货膨胀率持平。【原文：South Africa’s inflation rate flatlined on the eve of a widely expected interest-rate pause.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车业从国防繁荣中寻求生机
item.description: 马丁-比克斯（Martin Büchs）的家族企业位于巴伐利亚小镇，一个多世纪以来一直为汽车制造商提供换挡和发动机冷却系统。【原文：Martin Büchs’ family business in small-town Bavaria has been supplying gearshift and engine-cooling systems to carmakers for more than a century.】

item.title: 维托尔公司以 16.5 亿美元从埃尼公司购买象牙海岸和刚果资产
item.description: 维托尔集团（Vitol Group）同意以 16.5 亿美元的价格从埃尼公司（Eni SpA）手中购买非洲一些勘探资产的股份。【原文：Vitol Group agreed to buy stakes in some exploration assets in Africa from Eni SpA for $1.65 billion.】

item.title: 投资者 AB 部门将以 22 亿美元收购 Nova 生物医学公司
item.description: 沃伦贝格家族控制的投资公司 Investor AB 旗下的一个部门已达成协议，将以 22 亿美元的企业价值收购 Nova Biomedical。【原文：A unit of Investor AB, the investment firm controlled by the Wallenberg family, has struck an agreement to acquire Nova Biomedical for an enterprise value of $2.2 billion.】

item.title: 印尼在市场疲软后保持利率稳定以支撑印尼盾
item.description: 在对经济前景的担忧引发本周市场大跌之后，印尼央行连续第二个月维持关键利率不变，寻求保护印尼盾。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank kept its key interest rate unchanged for a second straight month, seeking to safeguard the rupiah after concerns about the economy’s outlook triggered a market selloff this week.】

item.title: 刚果考虑请印尼帮助控制钴供应
item.description: 刚果的一个部长级委员会建议采取措施加强对钴出口的临时禁令，包括与电池金属的第二大供应国印度尼西亚合作。【原文：A Congolese ministerial committee recommended measures to bolster a temporary ban on cobalt exports, including working with Indonesia, the No. 2 supplier of the battery metal.】

item.title: 菲律宾对降低 GCash 和其他公司的公众持股比例持开放态度
item.description: 菲律宾证券监管机构的官员表示，随着菲律宾证券交易所寻求更多公司上市，该机构可以降低公司首次公开发行股票的最低流通量要求。【原文：The Philippines’ securities regulator can lower the minimum float requirement for companies conducting initial public offerings as the country’s stock exchange seeks more listings, officials said.】

item.title: 外国基金在抛售股票的同时大举投资印度债务
item.description: 由于押注印度央行将进一步降低利率，全球基金将在 3 月份增持印度债券，增持幅度为 6 个月来最大，同时退出当地股票。【原文：Global funds are set to boost their holdings of Indian bonds in March by the most in six months on bets of further interest-rate cuts by the central bank, even as they exit local equities.】

item.title: 埃尔多安对手被捕，政治风险上升，土耳其资产下挫
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安的政治对手埃克雷姆-伊马莫格鲁（Ekrem Imamoglu）被拘留后，土耳其股市下挫近 7%，10 年期国债收益率飙升至今年最高水平。里拉汇率创下历史新低。【原文：Turkish stocks sank almost 7% and 10-year government yields surged to the highest level this year after Ekrem Imamoglu, a political rival to President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, was detained. The lira extended a record low.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑从 1.30 美元下滑，英国股市将扩大涨幅
Cathie Wood 近一年来首次出售 Meta 股票
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的方舟投资管理公司（Ark Investment Management LLC）一年来首次减持 Meta Platforms 公司股票，这是美国大型科技股命运低迷的最新迹象。【原文：Cathie Wood’s Ark Investment Management LLC is cutting its stake in Meta Platforms Inc. for the first time in around a year, the latest sign of a downturn in fortunes for big US tech stocks.】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚进口激增，世界上最糟糕的货币面临更多痛苦
item.description: 坦桑尼亚是非洲经济增长最快的国家之一，但当地货币可能还需要一段时间才能受益。【原文：Tanzania is one of Africa’s fastest-growing economies, but it may be some time before the local currency benefits.】

item.title: 印尼最富有的女人三天内损失 36 亿美元
item.description: 连续三个星期，玛丽娜-布迪曼每天都会增加大约 3.5 亿美元的财富。【原文：For three weeks straight, Marina Budiman became roughly $350 million richer each day.】

item.title: 韩国采取行动遏制住宅市场投机行为的上升势头
item.description: 韩国代总统崔相木誓言采取 "一切可行的措施"，防止房地产市场出现狂热，因为这种狂热有可能使决策者支撑经济的努力复杂化。【原文：South Korea plans fresh curbs on housing transactions in Seoul as Acting President Choi Sang-mok vowed to take “all available steps” to prevent a frenzy in the property market that could potentially complicate efforts by policymakers to shore up the economy.】
